strvar <- function(var, linkname=NA) {
  s <- as.character(var)
  if(str_length(s)==0) {
    s <- "N/A"
  } else if (!is.na(linkname)) {
    s <- paste0("\\href{",s,"}{",linkname,"}")
  }
  return(s)
}

etab_header <- function(etab) {
  swurl <<- strvar(etab$url.siteweb,etab$url.siteweb)
  wdurl <<- strvar(etab$url.wikidata, etab$url.wikidata)  #substr(etab$url.wikidata,33,50))
  lfurl <<- strvar(etab$url.legifrance, "Legifrance")
  
  cat(paste0(
    "\\begin{tabular*}{\\textwidth}{rp{5cm}rl}  \n",
    "\\hline  \n",
    "Type : & ", strvar(etab$Type.détaillé)," & Web : &",swurl," \\\\  \n",
    "UAI : & ", strvar(etab$UAI)," & WikiData : & ",wdurl," \\\\  \n",
    "\\hline  \n",
    "\\end{tabular*}  \n"
    ))
}

## Taux de ressources propres

```{r classement.RP}

                  c("kpi.K.proPres", "kpi.FIN.P.ressources","kpi.FIN.S.ressourcesPropres"),
                  c("Taux","Ressources","Ressources  \n   Propres"))
```
